trends: There has been one other sighting in Conneaut
There were no other sightings in Conneaut on or around November 17th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsthree c-130 transports {black} and more in the distance by the sound.there was also 2 large twin rotor helicopters, also black.just wondered,since nothing else was happening in north western pennsylvania or northeastern ohio.I have not seen this much action up here since the last ufo out breakin mid-90's.i was walking my dog up near the football stadium,when the roar was deffening,the objecst were ours no doubt but all were black. ALL WERE HEADING TO THE EAST-SOUTH EAST.From ashtabula county to pennsylvania near lake erie.
